mapper.select: select score.stuNo as stuNo, score.courseNo as courseNo, score.term as term, score.score as score, course.courseName as courseName, teach.teaname as teaname from score left join course on score.courseNo = course.courseNo left join teach on course.teachno = teach.teano where teach.teano = #{teano} and course.courseNo = #{courseNo}
mapper.update: update score set score = #{score} where stuNo = #{stuNo} and courseNo = #{courseNo}
mapper.select: select * from score where stuNo = #{stuNo} and courseNo = #{courseNo}
